title: DRAGONS
body:
So, you guys may know a lot about the dragon skins if league be it from the dragon trainer, or slayer skin, or maybe it just being Shyvanna. So I wanted your opinion. What champion would you like being included in these ferocious skin lines?

- Dragon trainers - Lulu, Tristana
- Dragon Slayers - Pantheon, Jarvan, Braum, Vayne
- Shyvanna -

So, many people have requested Dragon trainer Swain as many people see him fitting and personally I would like the inclusion of Dragon Slayer Yasuo! (I have 2 or 3 threads I made on it) Yes I do know the band Wagon hate going on around Yasuo justified recently by his new broken build (which has/is being solved/nerfed) but this isn't a thread about that. SO WHAT DRAGON RELATED SKIN WOULD YOU LIKE IN THE LEAGUE OF LEGENDS?

replies.body:
Dragon Rider Corki
Dragon Rider Kled
Dragon Trainer Heimerdinger
Haha, I like the first two and how they'd be a good fit. As for heimer I'm not sure if placing down dragon turrets would be a good idea ;-;

Oh cmon who would dare to destroy them ?
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
They should have a dragon slayer skin for shyvana. {{champion:102}} in her lore, it says that she went with jarvan to kill the dragons that had killed her father... It would fit awesome
It would be a bit Ironic though as she's trying to get revenge and not just slaying random dragons xd
